lead_paragraph: While Mrs. Clinton re-established herself as the Democrats’ prohibitive favorite, Mr. Trump’s position as the Republican front-runner appears to be weakening.

headline.print_headline: Clinton and Trump Roll On, at Different Speeds
headline.main: Election Takeaways: Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump Roll On, at Different Speeds

snippet: While Mrs. Clinton re-established herself as the Democrats’ prohibitive favorite, Mr. Trump’s position as the Republican front-runner appears to be weakening.
abstract: Hillary Clinton and Donald J Trump both hold growing delegate leads in 2016 presidential primaries; while Clinton has assembled majority coalition within party, Trump is not guaranteed to win majority of Republican convention delegates; summary of each candidates' position in race given.
